title: Philippines weather forecasting gets boost with AI technology

title: Moody's flags risk in Oracle's $300 billion of recently signed AI contracts
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. ― US credit rating agency Moody’s Ratings flagged several potential risks in Oracle Corp.’s $300 billion of recently signed artificial intelligence (AI) contracts, but stopped short of taking ratings action against the software giant.

title: ‘AI will not solve Philippine corruption’
description: FORMER Commission on Audit (COA) commissioner Heidi Mendoza on Thursday said that artificial intelligence (AI) will not curb corruption in the Philippines because of fragmented data systems, poor accountability, and the government’s failure to modernize financial processes.

title: Nvidia CEO Huang caught between US, China's 'larger agendas'
description: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang said on Wednesday that Washington and Beijing “have larger agendas to work out” as the tech giant navigates the tricky politics of the US-China trade war and tries to satisfy demand from companies worldwide hungry for the company’s crucial artificial intelligence (AI) chips.

title: Meta in talks with Fox Corp, News Corp over AI content licensing: report
description: Meta has held talks in recent months with news organizations including Axel Springer, Fox Corp and News Corp – The Post’s owner – over content licensing deals for its artificial intelligence tools, according to a report.
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Strengthening Disaster Response in Himachal: Focus on AI and Training
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. title: PublicAI Joins Forces with Abaka AI in $10.24M Global Mission to Build the Human-Powered Future of AI
description: The Human Layer of AI enables everyone to contribute training dataSan Francisco, CA, Sept. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PublicAI, a global leader in human-verified data infrastructure, announced today a $10.24 million strategic partnership with Abaka AI to co-launch Project EVA, a global AI evaluation challenge organized by the 2077AI Open Source Foundation. This initiative brings together leading AI organizations to expose the blind spots of current AI systems and build the human layer essential to advancing Artificial General Intelligence (AGI).

title: AI recreations of NFL home stadiums are awesome
description: If artificial intelligence is going to take over the world, we might as well get some amazing NFL stadiums out of it. A TikTok user with the handle @trendlensvault recently used AI to show what current NFL stadiums would look like if they had themes that were closely related to their team’s name.

title: William Michael Hadala Jr.: How to Build GridEdge AI Infrastructure for Critical Sectors

title: AI for ecology and conservation: New tools track food webs and soundscapes
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is opening new ground in ecology. At Rice University, César A. Uribe is developing computational tools to help scientists better understand ecosystems with recent studies using AI to glean new insights from different kinds of ecological data—from African mammal food webs to tropical forest soundscapes.
